data.prayer: Lord, make the 16,487 believers in Kerman to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 3,148,213 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kerman, Iran

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Kerman.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 3,164,700 people living in Kerman through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Kerman to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Father, 0.1% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, please raise up every one you have called in Kerman, Iran to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Kerman, Iran to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.section_summary:
the state of Kerman, Iran has a population of 3,164,700.

We estimate Kerman has 16,487 people who might know Jesus, 42,735 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,105,478 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 191 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Kerman, Iran.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.
